python.linting.pylintArgs: from pylint.config import find_pylintrc; import os, sys; sys.path.append(os.path.join(os.path.dirname(find_pylintrc()), "dev/.venv/lib/python3.5/site-packages")); sys.path.append(os.path.join(os.path.dirname(find_pylintrc()), "src/yodaspeak-server/src")); sys.path.append(os.path.join(os.path.dirname(find_pylintrc()), "tools/venv/lib/python3.5/site-packages"))
